name: Your Duckiness
description:
This was made for the Untitled Game Jam #37 Hosted by Thedrdevin, LexLoco. The theme was  "(Ducks)".

I present, Your Duckiness. This is a comedic brawler styled after Pokemon. Play as Burter who decides to pummel his way through 17 enemies before fighting King Duckster himself for the next righteous title of King of Duckeroo.

I hope you enjoy and please consider purchasing a downloadable version of the game.

Saving is implemented.

Yours Truly,

King Burter :) 👑🦆💖

And I hope everyone had a Happy Thanksgiving! 😊
